original_title: Golden Memories (Petite Histoire of Indonesian Cinema)
overview: Going through a journey of three filmmakers trail tracing Indonesiaâ€™s family cinema. From Indonesia to the Netherlands and back, they met Kwee Zwan Liang Cinema and Rusdy Attamimi Cinema, to a whole other level of the journey that brought them to not only culture issues in the public cinema but also on aesthetics and the truth of family cinema from a generation to the ones to come.
title: Golden Memories (Petite Histoire of Indonesian Cinema)
